partnershipMessage.title: Not only
partnershipMessage.description: At Capital Chain, our community is our most valuable asset. We believe in empowering the pioneers within it — our affiliates. They are not just partners in registration fees; they are strategic partners in our long-term growth. Affiliates receive exclusive airdrops and allocations of the CCHAIN token as additional incentives. We offer three allocation tiers based on the size of your community — the larger your community, the greater your allocation. Each point earned will be calculated and converted into token quantities after the ICO announcement, depending on the total number of participating communities.

footer.disclaimerText1: Trading in financial markets involves significant risk and may result in the loss of your capital. The services provided by Capital Chain L.L.C FZ, registered under license number 2532140 and headquartered at Meydan Grandstand, 6th Floor, Meydan Road, Nad Al Sheba, Dubai, U.A.E, are strictly for educational and evaluation purposes and do not constitute investment advice or any form of financial recommendation.
footer.disclaimerText2: Capital Chain L.L.C FZ is not a broker, investment advisor, or a provider of financial guarantees. All evaluation programs are designed to assess trading skills and risk management capabilities.
footer.disclaimerText3: Past performance is not indicative of future results. Virtual trading results do not guarantee real trading success.
footer.disclaimerText4: Please ensure you fully understand the risks involved and seek independent advice if necessary before participating in any trading activities.
footer.disclaimerText5: By using our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms and conditions.

questions.howToCreateAccount: How do I create an account?
questions.whatDoINeedToGetStarted: What do I need to get started?
questions.howToChangePassword: How do I change my password?
questions.howToUpdateProfile: How do I update my profile?
questions.paymentMethods: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.billingHistory: How do I view my billing history?
questions.twoFactorAuth: How do I enable two-factor authentication?
questions.compromisedAccount: What should I do if my account is compromised?
questions.slowPlatform: The platform is running slowly, what should I do?
questions.errorMessage: I'm getting an error message, how do I fix it?
questions.apiKey: How do I get an API key?
questions.rateLimits: What are the rate limits for the API?

answers.createAccountAnswer: To create an account, click on the 'Sign Up' button and fill in your details. You will need to provide a valid email address and create a secure password. After submitting the form, check your email for a verification link to activate your account.
answers.getStartedAnswer: You just need a valid email address and a secure password. Make sure your password contains at least 8 characters with a mix of letters, numbers, and special characters for better security.
answers.changePasswordAnswer: Go to Settings > Security > Change Password. Enter your current password, then your new password twice to confirm. Make sure your new password is strong and unique.
answers.updateProfileAnswer: Navigate to your profile page and click the edit button. You can update your personal information, profile picture, and other preferences from there.
answers.paymentMethodsAnswer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers. All payments are processed securely through our encrypted payment gateway.
answers.billingHistoryAnswer: Go to Account > Billing to view your complete payment history. You can download invoices, view transaction details, and manage your payment methods from this section.
answers.twoFactorAuthAnswer: Go to Settings > Security > Two-Factor Authentication and follow the setup guide. You can use an authenticator app like Google Authenticator or receive SMS codes for added security.
answers.compromisedAccountAnswer: Immediately change your password and contact our support team. Enable two-factor authentication if you haven't already, and review your recent account activity for any suspicious actions.
answers.slowPlatformAnswer: Try clearing your browser cache or switching to a different browser. Also, check your internet connection and close any unnecessary browser tabs. If the problem persists, contact our technical support team.
answers.errorMessageAnswer: Please contact our support team with the exact error message you're seeing, along with details about what you were trying to do when the error occurred. Include your browser type and version for faster troubleshooting.
answers.apiKeyAnswer: Go to Developer Settings and generate a new API key.
answers.rateLimitsAnswer: The standard rate limit is 1000 requests per hour.

contentSections.stepByStepDescription: Follow these detailed instructions to complete the process successfully. Each step is designed to be clear and easy to understand. FundingPips, founded in November 2022, is built by traders for traders. We understand firsthand the challenges traders face in this industry, and our goal is to change the game. As a trusted trading firm headquartered in Dubai, we are committed to providing traders with the best tools, resources, and support to unlock their full potential and succeed.
contentSections.importantNotesDescription: Please keep these important points in mind while following the instructions. These notes will help you avoid common mistakes.
contentSections.additionalResourcesDescription: For more detailed information and advanced configurations, please refer to our comprehensive documentation and support materials.

about.title: About Us
about.firstText: Welcome to Capital Chain, a pioneering force in the blockchain and cryptocurrency industry.
about.secondText: Established in Dubai's Meydan Free Zone, we are committed to revolutionizing digital finance through innovative solutions.
about.whiteText: We strive to create a seamless bridge between traditional finance and the digital economy, empowering individuals and businesses to thrive in the new financial landscape.
about.missionDescription: We're not just building a firm — we're building a movement for the next generation of trading.

missionBoxes.trustTransparency: Restore trust and transparency through on-chain verification and smart contract Funding-Payout control.
missionBoxes.decentralizedControl: Decentralized control by empowering traders and community leaders through blockchain, not corporations.
missionBoxes.protectTraders: Protect traders from abuse by creating an automated and transparent ecosystem.
missionBoxes.healthyEnvironment: Foster a healthy environment for growth, collaboration, and financial success — for traders, by traders.

descriptions.completeCryptoGuideDesc: Learn the fundamentals of cryptocurrency trading, including market analysis, risk management, and profitable strategies for both beginners and experienced traders.
descriptions.bitcoinAnalysis2024Desc: Comprehensive analysis of Bitcoin price trends and future predictions for the cryptocurrency market in the upcoming year.
descriptions.riskManagementDesc: Essential risk management techniques to protect your capital and maximize profits in cryptocurrency trading.
descriptions.technicalAnalysisDesc: Master the basics of technical analysis and learn how to use indicators effectively in your trading decisions.
descriptions.choosingExchangeDesc: Important factors to consider when selecting a secure and reliable cryptocurrency exchange for your trading needs.
descriptions.blockchainFutureDesc: Exploring the potential applications of blockchain technology and its impact on various industries worldwide.
descriptions.defiProtocolsDesc: Understanding decentralized finance protocols and how to maximize returns through yield farming strategies.
descriptions.nftTrendsDesc: Analyzing the current NFT market landscape and identifying potential investment opportunities in digital assets.
descriptions.cryptoRegulationsDesc: Overview of cryptocurrency regulations across different countries and their impact on the global market.
descriptions.smartContractDevDesc: Step-by-step guide to developing and deploying smart contracts on various blockchain platforms.
descriptions.cryptoMiningDesc: Complete guide to cryptocurrency mining, including hardware requirements, profitability, and environmental considerations.
descriptions.portfolioDiversificationDesc: Learn how to build a diversified cryptocurrency portfolio to minimize risk and maximize long-term returns.
descriptions.stakingPassiveIncomeDesc: Explore various staking opportunities and passive income strategies in the cryptocurrency ecosystem.
descriptions.layer2SolutionsDesc: Understanding Layer 2 scaling solutions and their role in improving blockchain performance and reducing fees.
descriptions.cryptoTaxDesc: Navigate the complex world of cryptocurrency taxation and learn how to properly report your trading activities.
descriptions.securityBestPracticesDesc: Essential security measures to protect your cryptocurrency investments from hacks, scams, and theft.
descriptions.altcoinAnalysisDesc: Framework for analyzing and selecting promising altcoins for your investment portfolio.
descriptions.marketPsychologyDesc: Understanding market psychology and emotional factors that influence cryptocurrency trading decisions.
descriptions.institutionalAdoptionDesc: Examining the growing trend of institutional cryptocurrency adoption and its impact on market dynamics.
descriptions.web3DAppsDesc: Introduction to Web3 technology and the development of decentralized applications on blockchain platforms.

johnSmith.name: John Smith
johnSmith.content: Chapital Chain has revolutionized my trading experience. The platform's advanced tools and real-time analytics have significantly improved my trading performance.

sarahJohnson.name: Sarah Johnson
sarahJohnson.content: The educational resources and community support at Chapital Chain are exceptional. I've learned more in 6 months than I did in years of trading elsewhere.

michaelChen.name: Michael Chen
michaelChen.content: Outstanding platform with lightning-fast execution and comprehensive market analysis. The customer support team is always ready to help when needed.

emilyDavis.name: Emily Davis
emilyDavis.content: Chapital Chain's innovative approach to trading has helped me diversify my portfolio effectively. The risk management tools are top-notch.

alexRodriguez.name: Alex Rodriguez
alexRodriguez.content: The 12% drawdown gave me breathing space. I could trade properly without pressure and focus on my strategy.

davidWilson.name: David Wilson
davidWilson.content: The seamless integration of traditional and crypto trading on one platform is amazing. Chapital Chain truly understands modern traders' needs.

descriptions.disciplineConsistencyDesc: This section covers the importance of maintaining discipline and consistency in trading activities. Traders must adhere to established rules and maintain consistent behavior throughout their trading journey.
descriptions.tradingBehaviourRulesDesc: All trading activities must comply with our established behavioral guidelines and rules. This includes proper risk management, adherence to position sizing, and following our trading protocols.
descriptions.toxicTradingFlowDesc: Certain trading behaviors are considered toxic and are strictly prohibited. This includes revenge trading, over-leveraging, and any activities that violate our risk management principles.
descriptions.tradingInstrumentsDesc: Information about approved trading instruments, including forex pairs, commodities, indices, and cryptocurrencies that are available for trading on our platform.
descriptions.accountCredentialsDesc: Guidelines for managing account credentials, including password security, two-factor authentication requirements, and account access protocols.
descriptions.rewardsDesc: Details about our reward system, including profit sharing, performance bonuses, and incentive programs available to qualified traders.
descriptions.scalingUpDesc: Information about account scaling opportunities, including criteria for account size increases and performance requirements for advancement.
descriptions.mergingAccountsDesc: Policies and procedures for merging multiple trading accounts, including eligibility requirements and the merging process.
descriptions.refundsDesc: Our refund policy, including conditions under which refunds may be granted and the process for requesting refunds.
descriptions.inactivityDesc: Policies regarding account inactivity, including dormancy periods, account maintenance, and reactivation procedures.
descriptions.ipAddressDesc: Guidelines regarding IP address usage, including restrictions on VPN usage, geographic limitations, and security protocols.
